module.name: Game Collection Manager
module.description: Video game and hardware collection tracking with AI-powered management, wishlist planning, and sell list workflows

structure.ai-instructions: AI behavior rules and gaming domain expertise for collection management
structure.collection: Video game and hardware inventory organized by platform and category
structure.planning: Wishlist tracking and sell list workflow management
structure.activity: Optional play logging and gaming session tracking
structure.templates: Structured templates for consistent data entry across all items
structure.reference: Condition standards, platform guides, and pricing resources

features: Individual game files per platform for efficient AI access
Comprehensive hardware tracking (consoles, controllers, VR, handhelds)
Optional play logging and session tracking
Market value and price target monitoring
User-customizable AI instructions and reference materials
